document_data.name: Wyrmcrown
document_data.Abilities: The Wyrmcrown allowed its bearer to magically poison any dragon who was blood-related to it, or a dragon whose blood the bearer had tasted. The Wyrmcrown could affect any dragon within the continent of [[Laerakond]].
document_data.History: As of [[1479 DR]], the Wyrmcrown was in the possession of the Empress Dragon [[Gauwervyndhal]].
